short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mickey Mouse Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Mickey Mouse background. Mickey Mouse wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Mickey Mouse wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Set your Mickey Mouse background randomly or select favorites in the wallpaper chooser.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Create new notes to keep track of tasks.
7. Shortcut links to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick link to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add sites to the Shortcut panel for swift navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. One-tap access to gaming.
15. Activate festive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Mickey Mouse tab.
